channel.title: Javascript on Abdias Rivera

item.title: Tema usado en mi webpage hugo
item.description: In my last article series about automated testing, we were looking at how to set up Nightwatch.js, write smart step definitions and how to run automated cross browser acceptance tests on BrowserStack with Nightwatch.js. Today we’re going to look at two ways of speeding up the process of running tests with Nightwatch.js â€“ because faster is always better. Running Nightwatch.js without Selenium The first small speed improvement can be achieved by eliminating Selenium from the setup.
